item.title: Classic Royal Blue Long Sleeve Polo T-Shirt

item.title: Cotton Crew Neck Tee
item.description: Stay cool and comfortable with this Cotton Crew Neck Tee, made from 100% soft, breathable cotton. Featuring a classic crew neck and regular fit, it’s perfect for everyday wear—easy to style, durable, and effortlessly versatile for any occasion.

item.title: Cotton Crew Neck Tee
item.description: Stay effortlessly casual with this Cotton Crew Neck Tee, crafted from 100% premium cotton for superior softness and breathability. Designed with a classic crew neckline and a comfortable regular fit, it’s perfect for everyday wear, whether at home, work, or on the go. Easy to pair with jeans, shorts, or chinos, this versatile tee is a timeless wardrobe essential for a clean, relaxed look.

item.title: The Exceutive Essential Set
item.description:
Make your gifting truly special with The Executive Essentials Set, an elegant and functional combo designed for professionals, corporate employees, students, and all gifting occasions. This premium set blends utility, sophistication, and personalization, making it an ideal choice for both personal and professional gifting.
Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this luxurious gift box includes five thoughtfully chosen accessories — a classic diary, stainless steel temperature bottle, coffee mug, premium pen, and metal keychain. Each item can be custom-engraved with a name, logo, or message, creating a memorable keepsake that reflects appreciation and style.

item.title: Smiley Star of the Week Badges
item.description:
Recognize achievements and spread positivity with the Star of the Week Badges! Featuring a bright smiley design and easy-to-pin clasp, these durable, reusable badges are perfect for schools, offices, and events to celebrate effort, good behavior, or outstanding performance. Celebrate achievements and encourage positive behavior with the Star of the Week Badges, a fun and engaging way to recognize effort, good conduct, or exceptional performance. Designed for schools, offices, clubs, and events, these badges add a cheerful touch while motivating students, employees, or participants to strive for excellence.
Crafted from durable, high-quality materials, the badges are built to last and can be reused multiple times, making them a practical choice for ongoing reward programs. The bright and vibrant smiley design instantly draws attention and spreads positivity, while the easy-to-use safety pin clasp ensures they can be securely attached to uniforms, shirts, bags, or lanyards without causing damage.
Whether you’re a teacher recognizing outstanding students, a manager appreciating team performance, or an event organizer highlighting achievements, these badges make every “star” feel valued and proud.
Key Features:
Design: Colorful and cheerful smiley motif for instant appeal
Attachment: Simple safety clasp for easy pinning
Durability: Strong and reusable for long-term use
Ideal For: Schools, teachers, student reward programs, office recognition, or event giveaways
 
Make recognition fun and memorable with the Star of the Week Badges, helping individuals shine while boosting confidence and motivation.

item.title: BlueTote Everyday Sling
item.description: Stay organized and stylish with the BlueTote Everyday Sling, crafted from premium denim in a classic jean blue shade. This lightweight and durable crossbody bag features a spacious main compartment with inner pockets, a secure flap closure, and an adjustable shoulder strap for a comfortable fit. Perfect for college, work, travel, shopping, or daily outings, it combines practicality with effortless style, making it an ideal companion for your everyday adventures.

item.title: NY Heritage Cap
item.description: Elevate your everyday style with the CityVibe New York Street Cap, a perfect mix of comfort, durability, and urban fashion. Made from high-quality cotton fabric, this lightweight and breathable cap keeps you cool and comfortable all day long. The bold embroidered New York logo on the front adds a trendy streetwear touch, while the curved brim provides classic sporty vibes and sun protection. With an adjustable strap at the back, it offers a secure and customized fit for all head sizes. Whether you’re heading out for a casual outing, a workout session, or simply want to complete your everyday look, this versatile cap is the ideal choice to add effortless style and confidence to any outfit.

item.title: The Heritage Tea Box
item.description: Our Heritage Tea Box delivers a delightful blend of taste and wellness. Inspired by the periwinkle (sadabahaar) flower—symbolizing vitality and timeless beauty—this refreshing hamper is perfect for every season. Start your day with a revitalizing honey lemonade to boost metabolism, enjoy a nutty sattu protein drink to enhance daily nutrition, or impress your guests with natural honey-based fruity cocktails and wholesome nutty smoothies. With the Heritage Tea Box , every sip is a celebration of health and flavor.

item.title: Vacuum Flask Set with Bottles and Cups
item.description: This vacuum flask set is a versatile and practical collection designed to keep your beverages at the desired temperature, whether hot or cold, for an extended period. The double-walled vacuum insulation technology ensures excellent heat and cold retention, making it perfect for travel, office, home, or outdoor activities. Each flask features a secure, leak-proof lid to prevent spills and maintain freshness, while the included cups offer convenient serving for various beverages. This set is an ideal and eco-friendly way to enjoy your favorite drinks anytime, anywhere.

item.title: Celestial Diwali Corporate Gifts
item.description: Celebrate Diwali with this thoughtfully curated Giftara hamper that brings sweetness, tradition, and style together. It features 5 delicious chocolate crackers, 100g of natural and organic almonds and 100g of natural and organic cashews, each packed in charming potlis. The set also includes 2 hammered copper glasses for a touch of elegance and 2 beautifully painted terracotta diyas to light up your celebrations. All these items are carefully arranged in the vibrant and festive Giftara Diwali Raspberry Glace box (10 × 10 × 4 inches), making it a perfect gift to delight your loved ones and add joy to the festive season.

item.title: Festive Cheers & Treats
item.description: This beautifully curated festive hamper features a blend of thoughtful and eco-friendly delights. It includes a set of two Mandala Printed Tin Candles that add a warm, aesthetic touch, along with a 60 gms pack of crunchy Aloo Bhujia for a savory treat. The hamper also features a set of four vibrant Rice Rangoli Test Tubes to brighten any celebration, eco-conscious Seed Crackers (Plant Patakhas) for a green twist on traditional festivities, and five delicious Choco Crackers to satisfy sweet cravings. All these carefully selected items come elegantly packed in a GT Midnight Cherry Blossom Box measuring 27 x 18.7 x 6 cm, making it a perfect gift for festive occasions.

item.title: Festive Flavours
item.description: This festive hamper is a delightful blend of traditional flavors and handcrafted elegance. It includes 8–10 pieces (150 gms) of crispy Chakli, a timeless festive snack, paired with a pack of Shakarpara (200 gms) and Chivda Namkeen for a perfect balance of sweet and savory indulgence. Adding a touch of artistry, the hamper features a set of two beautifully painted terracotta diyas adorned with dried flowers—ideal for brightening up the festive décor. To complete the assortment, it includes Jaipuri Ghewars and Tikoni Mathri (80 gms), offering authentic Rajasthani taste in every bite. All these festive treasures are thoughtfully arranged in The Giftara Festive Box measuring 10 x 8 x 4 inches, making it a charming and elegant gifting choice for the season.

item.title: Festive Limelights in Lilac
item.description: This beautifully curated hamper includes 200g of Kaju Katli elegantly wrapped in satin and adorned with dry flowers, a pack of soothing Lavender Dhoop Cones, 80g of crunchy Smoor Rice Crisps, and a healthy Signature Seed Mix featuring an assorted blend of nutritious seeds. All these items are thoughtfully arranged in a festive Gota Patti embellished top-bottom box measuring 10 × 7.5 × 3.5 inches, making it a perfect gift to celebrate special occasions with style and elegance.

item.title: Mitti & Mithaas Hamper
item.description: This exquisite hamper is a perfect blend of tradition and sweetness. It features 200 gm of delicious Doda Barfi, a classic Indian sweet, alongside a set of two handcrafted terracotta diyas, adding a touch of elegance and festivity. The Giftara Tilak Set, comprising roli, rice, mishri, and chandan, brings the essence of traditional rituals to your celebrations. item.title: Regal Diwali Delights
item.description: This delightful hamper features 200g of Moong Barfi, crunchy Smoor Rice Crisps, 2 Laddoo candle blocks, and 2 Laddoo-shaped candles for a festive touch. item.description: This festive hamper beautifully blends flavor, fragrance, and tradition. item.title: Music Bird Aroma Diffuser
item.description: The Music Bird Aroma Diffuser is a stylish and multifunctional device that combines aromatherapy, soothing music, and ambient lighting to create a relaxing atmosphere. Designed with an elegant bird-cage aesthetic, it features small decorative bird figures inside and emits a soft, calming light. The diffuser releases a gentle mist of fragrance to freshen the air while playing soft music for a peaceful experience. It is USB-powered, compact, and ideal for use in bedrooms, offices, or meditation spaces. This diffuser adds both beauty and tranquility to any environment.
item.g:product_type: Home Lifestyle Gifts > All > Budget 500-1000 > under-1000 > Watch and Buy

item.title: TripFactory Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated Bottle
item.description: The TripFactory Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated Bottle is a sleek, durable, and travel-friendly bottle that keeps drinks hot for up to 12 hours and cold for up to 24 hours. Made from high-quality stainless steel with a matte black finish, it features a leak-proof lid, double-wall insulation, and a modern design. Lightweight, reusable, and eco-friendly, it’s perfect for travel, office, gym, or daily use.

item.title: Electric Mixing Mug
item.description: The Electric Mixing Mug is a stylish and practical self-stirring mug designed to automatically blend your favorite beverages with just the press of a button. Featuring a sleek glass body, wooden handle, and matching wooden lid, this mug combines elegance with modern convenience. It’s perfect for making instant coffee, hot chocolate, protein shakes, or any powdered drink effortlessly — simply add your drink powder, pour in hot water, and let the mug do the mixing for you. With its built-in automatic stirrer, it ensures a smooth, lump-free drink every time while saving you time and effort. The transparent design allows you to see the blending process, adding a touch of sophistication to your daily routine. Ideal for home, office, or gifting, the Electric Mixing Mug makes beverage preparation easy, mess-free, and enjoyable.
item.g:product_type: Home Lifestyle Gifts > All > Under 500 > Wedding & Anniversary

item.title: Digital Wooden Alarm Clock with Wireless Charger
item.description: Enhance your bedside or office setup with this sleek modern wooden LED alarm clock — a perfect blend of style, technology, and practicality. Crafted with a premium wood-grain finish, this clock adds a touch of warmth and sophistication to any décor while keeping you on time and connected. Designed with both elegance and functionality, it clearly displays the time, temperature (°F/°C), and features a built-in Qi wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled smartphones, earbuds, and other devices. Simply place your device on top for effortless, cable-free charging.
item.g:product_type: Home Lifestyle Gifts > All > Budget 500-1000 > Graduation > under-1000

item.title: Pickup Dynamic Humidifier
item.description: Experience cleaner, fresher air with the Pickup Dynamic Humidifier, your perfect home or office companion for creating a comfortable and healthy indoor environment. Designed with modern technology and sleek aesthetics, this humidifier ensures optimal humidity levels while adding a touch of elegance to any space. Built to enhance your daily comfort, the Pickup Dynamic Humidifier uses ultrasonic mist technology to deliver a fine, cool mist that quickly balances the moisture in the air.

item.title: Pickup Anti-Gravity Dynamic Humidifier
item.description: Experience a new level of innovation and relaxation with the Pickup Anti-Gravity Dynamic Humidifier, a cutting-edge device that combines modern technology, visual artistry, and practical functionality. Designed to elevate your home or office environment, this humidifier not only moisturizes the air but also mesmerizes you with its anti-gravity water droplet display — a stunning illusion that makes water appear to flow upward. Using ultrasonic mist technology, it emits a fine, cool mist that refreshes your space, balances humidity levels, and helps relieve dryness in the skin, throat, and sinuses. Its whisper-quiet operation ensures a calm and comfortable atmosphere, perfect for sleep, work, yoga, or meditation.
item.g:product_type: Home Lifestyle Gifts > All > Birthday > Budget 500-1000 > under-1000

item.title: Small Portable Juicer (Multi-Function Blender)
item.description: The Small Portable Juicer is a stylish and multi-functional mini blender designed for people on the go. With a 400 ml capacity, stainless-steel blades, and USB rechargeable battery, it easily blends smoothies, juices, and shakes anytime, anywhere. Its compact, lightweight design makes it perfect for home, office, gym, or travel use. Simple one-button operation and easy cleaning add to its convenience. A smart and useful choice for daily use or thoughtful gifting — perfect as a modern wedding return gift or corporate gift.

item.title: LED Digital Mirror Alarm Clock
item.description: The LED Digital Mirror Alarm Clock is a modern and multifunctional timepiece designed to add elegance and convenience to your daily routine. Featuring a sleek mirror-finish LED display, it clearly shows the time, temperature, and alarm settings, making it perfect for your bedroom, office, or study desk. With adjustable brightness, a snooze function, and USB or battery power options, it combines style with practicality. The mirror surface also doubles as a mini makeup or desk mirror, enhancing its usability. Compact, stylish, and easy to use — it’s an ideal choice for home décor, corporate gifting, or wedding return gifts.

item.title: Leakproof Insulated Stainless Steel Bottle with Handle (1200ml)
item.description: Stay hydrated in style with this Leakproof Insulated Stainless Steel Bottle, designed for both comfort and durability. With a large 1200ml capacity, it keeps your beverages hot or cold for hours, making it perfect for daily use, travel, gym sessions, or office work. The double-wall vacuum insulation maintains the ideal temperature, while the ergonomic handle ensures a secure and comfortable grip. Its leakproof lid comes with a built-in straw for convenient sipping, whether you’re on the move or relaxing at home. Crafted from premium stainless steel, it’s rust-resistant, easy to clean, and built to last.

item.title: Customized Mugs
item.description: Add a personal touch to your daily coffee ritual with our premium customized mugs. Designed for professionals and teams, these mugs can be personalized with company logos, employee names, or motivational quotes — making them ideal for corporate gifting and events.Durable, stylish, and dishwasher-safe, they’re the perfect blend of functionality and branding. Ideal for: Employee appreciation, client gifts, event giveaways.
